SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF102-In General You Say Child Health Is
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - In general, would you say your child's health is.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - In General You Say Child Health Is

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF102-Doing Things That Take Some Energy
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, has your child been limited in any of the following activities due to HEALTH problems - Doing things that take some energy such as riding a bike or skating?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Doing Things That Take Some Energy

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, has your child been limited in any of the following activities due to HEALTH problems - bending, lifting, or stooping?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Bending, Lifting, Stooping

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, has your child been limited in the KIND of schoolwork or activities with friends he/she could do because of PHYSICAL health problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Physical: Schoolwork, Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, has your child been limited in the KIND of schoolwork or activities with friends he/she could do because of EMOTIONAL or BEHAVIORAL problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Emotional: Schoolwork, Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF102-How Much Bodily Pain Child Had
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much bodily pain or discomfort has your child had?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - How Much Bodily Pain Child Had

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how satisfied do you think your child has felt about his/her friendships?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Felt About His/Her Friendships

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how satisfied do you think your child has felt about his/her life overall?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Felt About His/Her Life Overall

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much of the time do you think your child acted bothered or upset?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - Acted Bothered or Upset

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Acute, US Version 1.0 - Compared to other children your child's age, in general would you say his/her behavior is.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF10 v1.0 Children Acute - His/Her Behavior Is
